title: SuperMall-Website-Full Stack E-Commerce Website
description: TA scalable e-commerce platform built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Firebase, enabling global merchants to manage shops, products, and offers seamlessly.

title: Botnet Attack Detection using Deep Learning in-IoT
description: This project uses Python and machine learning models (LSTM, CNN, Autoencoders) to detect and classify network attacks (DDOS and Malware) through data preprocessing and feature extraction.

title: Mern Stack E-Commerce Website
description: Built a responsive e-commerce platform using the MERN stack, enabling seamless product management, user interaction, and secure transactions.

title: E-Commerce-Product-Recommendation-Engine
description: Developed an e-commerce product recommendation engine using collaborative filtering techniques in Python to provide personalized recommendations and enhance customer satisfaction.

title: Addressing EHR(Electronic Health Records) using Deep Learning
description: This is a project made to learn the latest languages by building an app.
